4:
heiress
['eres]
n. 女继承人(指很有钱)
a woman or girl who will receive money or property when another person dies.

She was the only heiress of her dad's 2 billion dollars.

6:
pessimist
['pesɪmɪst]
n. 悲观主义者

Don't be such a pessimist!

5,6:
real estate
	   [ɪ'steɪt]
房地产

The real estate industry is not doing well this year.

8,9:
dental check-up
['dentl]
牙齿检查
check-up尤其指体格方面的检查

The doctor suggested that my parents (should) do a thorough check-up once a year.

3:
outlook
n. 前景

The outlook for the economy is bad.

6:
referral
[rɪ'fərrəl]	
n. 介绍人

The patient is a referral from Dr. Bones.

5:
optimist
['ɑptɪmɪst]
n. 乐观主义者

She's a born optimist.

donut
[ˈdoʊˌnʌt]
n. 炸面包圈
英式为doughnut

4:
cream-filled
adj. 奶油馅的
...-filled 为...馅的，如 mushroom-filled dumplings 蘑菇馅的饺子
7,8:
chocolate frosting
            ['frɔstɪŋ]
巧克力糖霜

frosting n. 糖霜，英式为icing ['aɪsɪŋ] n.

3,4,5:
a couple of
几个

The doctor said my leg should be better in a couple of days.
